channel.title: Freezes when wielding stat ham
channel.description: Loading... Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method482(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1496) at client.method105(client.java:10126) at client.method36(client.java:2197) at client.method102(client.java:9337) at client.method9(client.java:10501) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:143) at client.run(client.java:92) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) this is the error i get in my client run window and i cant seem to find where the problem is can anyone help?

item.title: Freezes when wielding stat ham
item.dc:creator: @ryan_justin ryan justin
item.description:
